CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Premium Delivery relative to Breakfast Rush Order?
SRP.A: Premium Delivery is {below} Breakfast Rush Order in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Seasonal Special Order relative to Breakfast Rush Order?
SRP.A: Seasonal Special Order is {below} Breakfast Rush Order in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Standard Dine-in relative to Seasonal Special Order?
SRP.A: Standard Dine-in is {above} Seasonal Special Order in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Seasonal Special Order}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Loyalty Member Order}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Premium Delivery's minimum Average Order Value in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Premium Delivery's minimum Average Order Value is in {1998}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Standard Dine-in's maximum Average Order Value in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Standard Dine-in's maximum Average Order Value is in {2012}.

NC.Q: Between 2004 and 2006, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 2005 and 2008?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between 2004 and 2006 was {smaller} than between 2005 and 2008.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2004, did the total Average Order Value experience a larger or smaller change than between 2004 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total average order value between 2002 and 2004 was {smaller} than between 2004 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2001, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 2000 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 1999 and 2001 was {lower} than between 2000 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2011, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 1999 and 2010?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 1998 and 2011 was {higher} than between 1999 and 2010.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Seasonal Special Order} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Standard Dine-in and Breakfast Rush Order first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Standard Dine-in and Breakfast Rush Order first exchanged leading positions in {1999}.
